response.overview: Mother is very surprised when she opens one of the boxes and finds her wedding veil and lingerie. A deluge of emotions overcome her! She checks the time to make sure she will not be late. She pulls the corset from the box, checks the stockings for runs, then decides to take a moment for herself. Mother retrieves the rest of the wedding dress complete with a bottle of champagne! She just wants to relive the spark that was the romance of her marriage on her wedding night. She pops the cork on the champagne, pours herself a tall flute full, and proceeds to slip into the past as she tries on the familiar gown.
response.title: Memoirs Of Bad Mommies 15
